column4: damn, really? portage (emerge) is the only thing I miss from Gentoo...
let me rephrase that then, I love the setup of emerge, I hate compiling for days .. I'm not a very patient guy!
ahh, well, i wish they'd add portage to Ubuntu - it does support binary distributions (precompiled), there just aren't many available due to the nature of Gentoo
for teh amount of optimization you gain for time invested.. I'd rather just load a binary :)
